name: Actias
description:
Actias - A Prelude

Six bright stones brought you here

In your thoughts, an ancient, feeble voice has strength enough to whisper two words:

"Restore me"

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

wasd + mouse to move

left-click / F to interact

space to jump

esc to exit

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

NOTE: Some users have experienced crashing after the starting screen, if this occurs please create a shortcut to the game's .exe on your desktop, right click the shortcut and go to "Properties," and add "-force-d3d9" (without quotes) to the end of the "Target" field. If you still experience crashes, try downloading the "GFX Fix" version of the game
